Global.// NoWrite: Disable all caching and downloading (read-only mode for locked environments)

// Caching Settings: Control how files are cached locally

Cache.// EnableVideoCache: Cache YouTube/remote videos locally for faster replay
Cache.// MaxVideoCacheSizeMB: Maximum video cache size in megabytes (default: 2GB)
Cache.// MaxSubtitleCacheSizeMB: Maximum subtitle cache size in megabytes

// FFmpeg Settings: Configure where FFmpeg binaries are located

FFmpeg.// Path: Path to ffmpeg.exe/ffmpeg (or directory containing it). If not set, auto-downloads on first use.
FFmpeg.// UseHardwareAcceleration: Use GPU hardware acceleration if available

Ytdlp.// Path: Path to yt-dlp executable. If not set, auto-downloads on first use.
Ytdlp.// CookiesFromBrowser: Browser to extract cookies from (chrome, firefox, edge)

Render.// DefaultMode: Render mode: ascii, blocks, braille, matrix (default: braille)
Render.// CharacterAspectRatio: Character aspect ratio (width/height). 0.5 means chars are 2x taller than wide.
Render.// ContrastPower: Contrast enhancement (1.0 = none, higher = more contrast)
Render.// CharacterSetPreset: Character set for ASCII mode: extended (default), simple, block, classic

Playback.// LoopCount: Number of loops (0 = infinite, 1 = play once)
Playback.// BufferAheadFrames: Frames to buffer ahead for smooth playback (2-10)

Subtitles.// WhisperModel: Whisper model: tiny, base, small, medium, large

GifOutput.// FontSize: Font size for text rendering in GIFs
